info.description: Documentación del api v2.0 de lavanapp
info.title: API LAVANAPP

get.summary: Return the configuration detail of server

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Plataforma desde la que se hace la solicitud

parameters.name: Basic
parameters.description: encode base_64 (email:password(MD5)). Required by login with email

consumer_id.description: return consumer id if exists a consumer with the email

put.description: This can only be done by the logged in user. Login required if the token was created more than two days ago
This can only be done by the logged in user. Login required if the token was created more than two days ago

010304.error_desc: The new and old password must be different

010305.error_desc: New password and confirmation do not match

get.summary: Send an email or an SMS with the activation code
get.description: This can only be done with a token unauthorized.

put.description: This can only be done with a token unauthorized.

get.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

get.summary: Return categories with list of products
Return the detail of a product

product.name: 5 camisas
product.description_large: Oferta de 5 camisas. Lavaremos tus camisas, las plancharemos y te las entregaremos en tu domicilio en 24 horas

post.description: Login required if the token was created more than two days ago

040406.error_desc: Does not match the price calculated with the price received

040404.error_desc: Su pedido no pudo ser realizado, por favor intentalo de nuevo

get.summary: Return the detail of an order

040302.error_desc: The order does not belong to the user

discount_type.description: 1 if discount is fixed an 2 if discount is percentage

schedule.description: list of available date and time

get.summary: Return information about available pickup schedule

schedule.description: list of available date and time

get.summary: Return array with (cities) ciudades and (states) provincias

post.summary: Insert a new address associated with the user

010401.error_desc: Address is already associated with the user

010408.error_desc: Lo sentimos, Lavanapp no opera en esta zona. Estamos trabajando para ampliar nuestra área de servicio. ¡Muy pronto llegaremos hasta allí!

put.description: Login required if the token was created more than two days ago. Return the same address id if not exists an order associated; else, return a new address id.

010401.error_desc: Address is already associated with the user

010406.error_desc: You can not change the direction

010408.error_desc: Lo sentimos, Lavanapp no opera en esta zona. Estamos trabajando para ampliar nuestra área de servicio. ¡Muy pronto llegaremos hasta allí!

010407.error_desc: You can not delete the direction

040101.error_desc: Ha habido un problema con el pago, por favor intentalo de nuevo, si el error persiste escribenos a hola@lavanapp.com

040103.error_desc: The user is paying does not match the user who made the order

040407.error_desc: The gateway rejected the transaction because duplicate checks failed

040408.error_desc: The gateway rejected the transaction because AVS, CVV or fraud checks failed

id.description: id del usuario en caso de facebook

subtotal.description: If the price has decimals, it is rounded to two. If no coupon is applied to the order, the subtotal will be equal to the total_price

attribute_id.description: attribute id if the attribute selected is select or radiobutton

group_value.description: value of attribute multiplier (number of square meters, for example)

example.special_instructions: Dejar al vecino si no hay nadie en casa

inc_price.description: it can be empty ('') if exists attributes associated; else, 0.00 default

coupon.description: If a coupon has not been applied, it will be null

discount_type.description: 1 if discount is fixed an 2 if discount is percentage

discount.description: Coupon discount price without being applied to the order price
